MAN.TITLE: strong_connex

PARAM_DESCRIPTION.SP: : integer, number of strong connected components
: row vector of strong connected components

DESCRIPTION.P: strong_connex returns the number nc of strong connected components for the graph g and a row vector ncomp giving the number of the strong connected component for each node. For instance, if i is a node number, ncomp(i) is the number of the strong connected component to which node i belongs.
